attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown i am having to use this service to contact you because your email service is not working from mid June 
maybe this is a clue to why the country is floudering if a basic email service is not working what hope has the country got
back to the reason i am emailing you 
this morning i recieved a letter from the csa demanding £83.63 last november i paid the csa £6300 and was told my account was closed on speaking to the csa they say they had missed this amount and expect me to pay. The letter they sent me is bordering on bullying action they will take include freezing my bank account to going to prison this is ridiculous i am not a murderer if i  was i would get better treatment its no wonder great britain is going to the dogs we need to stand up and say NO to ridicoulous time wasting departments and concentrate on making britain great once more
your speedy reply would be good
regards steve hyde

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
